thread.title: Woman pilgrim dies in Buxar road accident
thread.title_full: Woman pilgrim dies in Buxar road accident

author: Feb
title: Woman pilgrim dies in Buxar road accident
text:
Woman pilgrim dies in Buxar road accident
Buxar: A woman pilgrim died and four others were injured when the car in which they were travelling lost control and overturned near Kisagarh village on the Buxar-Patna four-lane, under the jurisdiction of Krishna Brahm police station on Thursday.
According to the police, Jitendra Kesari, a resident of Lalganj under Brahmapur police station area in the district, had gone to Prayagraj with his wife and others to take the holy dip. The accident occurred while they were returning. Sanju Kesari, the wife of Jitendra Kesari, died on the spot. There were five people in the car, four of whom sustained injuries.
Two of the injured are in a critical condition while the other two have suffered minor injuries. The injured were been admitted to a nearby hospital. Krishna Brahm SHO Nitish Kumar said the woman's body was recovered and sent for a post-mortem. "The police are investigating the incident to determine the cause of the accident," he added.
